# php

<!---
Note: Do NOT edit directly, this file was generated using https://github.com/chainguard-images/readme-generator
-->

[![CI status](https://github.com/priyawadhwa/php/actions/workflows/release.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/priyawadhwa/php/actions/workflows/release.yaml)

This is a minimal PHP image based on Alpine, using PHP apks available on the Alpine Community repositories (not built from source as of now).<br/><br/>While this image is being developed, we will stick to the latest stable PHP version which at this moment is `8.1`. Supported versions in the long term are TBD.

## Get It!

The image is available on `cgr.dev`:

```
docker pull cgr.dev/chainguard/php:latest
```

## Supported tags

| Tag | Digest | Arch |
| --- | ------ | ---- |
| `8` `8-bullseye` `8-cli` `8-cli-bullseye` `8.1` `8.1-bullseye` `8.1-cli` `8.1-cli-bullseye` `8.1.10` `8.1.10-bullseye` `8.1.10-cli` `8.1.10-cli-bullseye` `8.1.10-r0` `bullseye` `cli` `cli-bullseye` `latest` | `sha256:dd1a697a81cca253ad4b6460f8dbd7a05d65db192cdd406871d1fbee84279f22`<br/>[View entry in Rekor](https://rekor.tlog.dev/?hash=sha256:dd1a697a81cca253ad4b6460f8dbd7a05d65db192cdd406871d1fbee84279f22) | `386` `amd64` `arm64` `armv6` `armv7` `ppc64le` `riscv64` `s390x` |


## Usage

To try out the image, run:

```shell
docker run --rm cgr.dev/chainguard/php --version
```

```
PHP 8.1.10 (cli) (built: Sep  1 2022 16:13:09) (NTS)
Copyright (c) The PHP Group
Zend Engine v4.1.10, Copyright (c) Zend Technologies
```

## Signing

All Chainguard Images are signed using [Sigstore](https://sigstore.dev)!

<details>
<br/>
To verify the image, download <a href="https://github.com/sigstore/cosign">cosign</a> and run:

```
COSIGN_EXPERIMENTAL=1 cosign verify cgr.dev/chainguard/php:latest | jq
```

## Build

This image is built with [apko](https://github.com/chainguard-dev/apko).
